DataElement.preferredName: Person Thoracic Surgeon Evaluation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria has been performed by a surgeon who specializes in treatment of diseases and disorders of the chest, heart and lungs as an element of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Thoracic Surgeon Evaluation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria by a surgeon who specializes in treatment of diseases and disorders of the chest, heart and lungs as an element of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Thoracic Surgeon Evaluation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A surgeon who specializes in treatment of diseases and disorders of the chest, heart and lungs.:Evaluation; the act of placing value on something.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A surgeon who specializes in treatment of diseases and disorders of the chest, heart and lungs.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Tumor verified by a thoracic
ReferenceDocuments.description: Tumor verified by a thoracic surgeon to be in a location that will permit sublobar resection.

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA5123
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the participant been assessed by surgeons and are considered surgically resectable?
